channel_data.title: SAMAA TV
channel_data.description:
SAMAA TV, your go-to destination for the latest breaking news, exclusive reports, live updates, and in-depth analysis from Pakistan and around the world. Stay ahead with real-time coverage of politics, business, sports, entertainment, and digital trends.

Live News 24/7 | Breaking Updates | Exclusive Interviews | Trending Stories

At SAMAA TV, we bring you authentic, unbiased journalism, ensuring you never miss a moment. Whether it's elections, economic developments, cricket highlights, or viral stories, we've got you covered with trusted reporting and expert opinions.

Subscribe Now for:
24/7 Live News Streaming
Latest Headlines & Breaking News
Exclusive Reports from Ground Zero
Expert Analysis & Talk Shows
Must-Watch Investigative Journalism

Turn on notifications and stay informed with Pakistan’s leading news channel!

videos_data.title: US delegation led by Trump administration official to visit Pakistan next week | Breaking News
videos_data.description:
#samaatv #america #pakistan 

A delegation from the United States, led by the Trump administration under the guidance of the State Department, is set to visit Pakistan next week.

The delegation will participate in the Pakistan Minerals Investment Forum from April 8 to 10. During the visit, they will also hold meetings with Pakistani officials to enhance economic cooperation and boost investment.

Eric Meyer, a senior official from the Bureau of South and Central Asian Affairs, will lead the delegation. This marks the first visit by a US official to Pakistan since Donald Trump assumed the presidency.

The delegation will include representatives from companies interested in Pakistan’s mineral sector. In addition to economic discussions, Eric Meyer is expected to engage with senior Pakistani officials on counter-terrorism cooperation.

videos_data.title: Naseem Vicky De Punjabi Kuriyan Show Mei Thumky | Punjabi Kuriyan | SAMAA TV
videos_data.description:
#manwasisters #punjabikudiyan #asmaabbas #punjabikuriyan #punjabikudi #punjabishow #punjabisuit #punjabi #india #pakistan #indianshow #punjabiculture #punjabitransmission #veenamalik #veenamalikvideo #veenamalikpodcast #asmaabbas #asmaabbasshow #veena 

Naseem Vicky De Punjabi Kuriyan Show Mei Thumky | Punjabi Kuriyan | SAMAA TV

Who is Veena Malik? 

Malik Naseem Waqas (born 18 July 1970), better known by his stage name Naseem Vicky, is a Pakistani theatre, television and film actor, director, producer, playwright and a stand-up comedian. He is working in Punjabi dramas as a stand-up comedian and also in some comedy shows on many news channels in Pakistan. He has also appeared in comedy shows in India, including Nautanki Ke Super Overs on Colors TV and Comedy Nights Bachao on Colors TV. He also participated in Kapil Sharma's shows Comedy Nights with Kapil and The Kapil Sharma Show.

Personal life
Naseem Vicky was born Malik Naseem Waqas in Faisalabad, Punjab, Pakistan on 18 July 1970.[4] In 2000, he moved to Lahore for his career. He is married to fellow TV actress Chandni Naseem.

Television and film actor
He has acted in many television series, including Family Front (1997), a well-known PTV sitcom.

He has also worked in movies.

Theatre actor, director, producer and playwright
In 2017, he wrote a comedy play based on the Indian movie Dangal (2016), Vicky essaying Aamir Khan's role. Few months later, he wrote and directed a play that parodied Indian movie Baahubali 2 (2017), also playing the main role. In 2020, he produced and directed a play, also a parody, based on Pakistan's famous drama Meray Paas Tum Ho (2019), where he was the lead actor alongside fellow comedian Qaiser Piya.

videos_data.title: Army Chief Sends Strong Message to Nation's Enemy | Breaking News | #trendingshorts
videos_data.description:
#samaatv #ispr #armychiefasimmunir #afghanistan 

Corps commanders resolve to thwart political, social elements seeking to destabilise Balochistan

Chief of Army Staff (COAS) General Syed Asim Munir presided over the 268th Corps Commanders Conference at the General Headquarters (GHQ) on Friday, where senior military leaders conducted an extensive review of the regional and internal security situation.

The conference began with prayers for the martyrs of the armed forces, law enforcement agencies, and innocent citizens who laid down their lives for the peace and stability of the country. The forum paid tribute to their unwavering sacrifices in defending the motherland.

videos_data.title: Army Chief Sends Strong Message to Nation's Enemy | Breaking News
videos_data.description:
#samaatv #ispr #armychiefasimmunir  #afghanistan #afghantaliban 

Corps commanders resolve to thwart political, social elements seeking to destabilise Balochistan

Chief of Army Staff (COAS) General Syed Asim Munir presided over the 268th Corps Commanders Conference at the General Headquarters (GHQ) on Friday, where senior military leaders conducted an extensive review of the regional and internal security situation.

The conference began with prayers for the martyrs of the armed forces, law enforcement agencies, and innocent citizens who laid down their lives for the peace and stability of the country. The forum paid tribute to their unwavering sacrifices in defending the motherland.

videos_data.title: Multan Sultans' Bowlers: The Biggest Threat to Their Opponents | SAMAA TV
videos_data.description:
#samaatv  #MultanSultansBowlers #multansultan #mediapartner #psl10 #samaatv #nadeemmalik 

Multan Sultans' Bowlers: The Biggest Threat to Their Opponents | SAMAA TV 

Samaa TV becomes Multan Sultans' media partner for PSL 10

On this occasion, the Sultans' owner, Ali Tareen expressed optimism about the partnership with Samaa TV again. “We are delighted to welcome Samaa TV as our official media partner for the Pakistan Super League and beyond," he said.

"Samaa TV’s through on-screen and digital media reach and credibility align perfectly with our vision of growing our fan base and keeping our supporters engaged throughout the year," Tareen said.

He said, "Their commitment to cricket coverage will ensure that Multan Sultans’ journey, both on and off the field, is brought to the fans in an exciting and engaging manner."

“Multan Sultans are built on the values of professionalism and performance, and we are confident that this partnership will be mutually beneficial," he said.

Tareen maintained, "Through Samaa TV, we will not only connect with our fans during HBL PSL but also promote our grassroots initiatives, which are instrumental in identifying and nurturing emerging men’s and women’s cricketers for future success.”

videos_data.title: Pakistan to enhance bilateral cooperation with Belarus: Abdul Aleem Khan | Samaa TV
videos_data.description:
#samaatv #aleemkhan  #abdulaleemkhan #belarus 

Aleem Khan meets Belarusian minister to strengthen ties

Pakistan to enhance bilateral cooperation with Belarus: Abdul Aleem Khan

Pakistan eyes trade corridors with Belarus to enhance access to Central Asia, Europe

Communications Minister Abdul Aleem Khan on Thursday stressed the importance of creating trade corridors between Pakistan and Belarus, state media reported, noting that they could be instrumental in helping both countries access markets in Central Asia and Europe. 

Pakistan and Belarus have moved closer to foster stronger trade and economic cooperation in recent months. Both countries marked 30 years of diplomatic ties last year. Belarus’s prime minister visited Islamabad in October 2024 to meet key Pakistani civilian and military officials to bolster economic cooperation. 

Khan arrived in Minsk on an official two-day visit to the country on Thursday. He met Belarusian Minister of Energy Denis Moroz and the country’s Transport Minister Alexei Lyakhnovich, state-run Associated Press of Pakistan (APP) reported. 

“He emphasized the importance of creating trade corridors between the two countries which could play a key role in facilitating access to Central Asian States through routes in Pakistan, China, Afghanistan, or Iran, ultimately opening up pathways to Eastern Europe,” APP reported. 

“Abdul Aleem Khan stated that these infrastructure projects would also be a strategic milestone.”

Khan highlighted the potential for “significant improvement” in the communications sector between both countries during his meeting with Belarusian ministers, APP said. 

It said the Pakistani minister is being hosted as a state guest in the eastern European country. He will have the opportunity to sign several new memoranda of understanding (MOUs) during his trip, APP said. 

Pakistan and Belarus agreed to boost cooperation in industry, media, tourism and other economic sectors during the eighth session of the Pakistan-Belarus Joint Ministerial Commission on Trade and Economic Cooperation held in February this year. 

Islamabad has aggressively pushed for trade and investment ties with regional allies such as China, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Central Asian countries and others recently in its bid to escape a prolonged macroeconomic crisis. 

Pakistan has signed MoUs worth billions of dollars with businesses and entities in China, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Azerbaijan and other countries since last year to ensure sustainable economic growth driven by increasing exports and financial reforms mandated by the International Monetary Fund (IMF).

videos_data.title: Trump launches historic global trade war against 185 countries, including Pakistan | Breaking News
videos_data.description:
#samaatv #trump #usa #pakistan #india #china #canada #trader #stockmarket 

The latest round of U.S. trade tariffs unveiled on Wednesday will sap yet more vigour from a world economy barely recovered from the post-pandemic inflation surge, weighed down by record debt and unnerved by geopolitical strife.

Depending on how President Donald Trump and leaders of other nations proceed now, it may also go down as a turning point for a globalised system that until now had taken for granted the strength and reliability of America, its largest component.

"Trump's tariffs carry the risk of destroying the global free trade order the United States itself has spear-headed since the Second World War," said Takahide Kiuchi, executive economist at Nomura Research Institute.

But in coming months it will be the plain and simple price-hiking - and therefore demand-dampening - effects of new levies applied to thousands of goods bought and sold by consumers and businesses across the planet that will prevail.

"I see it as a drift of the U.S. and global economy towards worse performance, more uncertainty and possibly heading towards something we could call a global recession," said Antonio Fatas, macroeconomist at the INSEAD business school in France.

Speaking in the White House Rose Garden, Trump said he would impose a 10% baseline tariff on all imports and held up a chart showing higher duties on some of the country's biggest trading partners, including 34% on China and 20% on the European Union.

Speaking in the White House Rose Garden, Trump said he would impose a 10% baseline tariff on all imports and held up a chart showing higher duties on some of the country's biggest trading partners, including 34% on China and 20% on the European Union.

videos_data.title: Good News For Pakistan! Oil and Gas Reserves Discovered in Pakistan | SAMAA TV
videos_data.description:
#samaatv #oil #gas #pakistan #islamabad 

Mari Petroleum Company has announced the discovery of a significant new oil and gas reserve in North Waziristan.

According to the company’s statement, the discovery was made at the Sampwam-1 well in Hangu district. Initial estimates suggest that the newly found reserve has the potential to produce 20 million cubic feet of gas per day. Additionally, the well is expected to yield 122 barrels of crude oil daily.

This marks the third consecutive successful oil and gas discovery by Mari Petroleum Company, further strengthening Pakistan’s energy sector.
.................

videos_data.title: How Did Arshad Nadeem's Younger Brother Develop a Passion for Javelin Throw? | SAMAA TV
videos_data.description:
#samaatv #sawerapasha #cricket #zorkajor #sawerapasha #Nadeemarshad  #mnadeem #arshadnadeem #arshadnadeemgoldmedal #arshadnadeemwins #arshadnadeemolympics 

How Did Arshad Nadeem's Younger Brother Develop a Passion for Javelin Throw? | SAMAA TV

Who is Arshad Nadeem? 

Arshad Nadeem PP HI is a Pakistani javelin thrower. He is the reigning Olympic and Commonwealth Games champion and the current silver medalist in the World Athletics Championship. His 92.97 metres (305.0 ft) throw at the 2024 Summer Olympics is an Olympic and Asian record and also the sixth longest throw in the history of javelin throw, when considering only the best throw from each athlete.

He is a two-time Olympian, and the first Pakistani to qualify for the final of any track and field event at the Olympic Games[8] and the World Athletics Championships.

At the 2022 Commonwealth Games, he set a new national and Commonwealth Games record with a throw of 90.18 m (295.9 ft) and became the first athlete from South Asia to breach the 90 m mark.[10] In the 2023 World Athletics Championships, he became the first Pakistani athlete to win a medal at the World Athletics Championships, a silver. He represents the Water and Power Development Authority (WAPDA) in the National Games of Pakistan.

Early life

Arshad Nadeem was born into a Punjabi Muslim family in Mian Channu, in the Punjab province of Pakistan. The family belongs to the Jat community. He is the third-oldest among eight siblings. Nadeem was an exceptionally versatile athlete from his early school years. Though he dabbled in all the sports on offer in his school — cricket, badminton, football and athletics — his passion was cricket, and he soon found himself playing it at district-level tape-ball tournaments.Upon entering grade seven in school, Nadeem caught the eye of Rasheed Ahmad Saqi during an athletics competition. Saqi had a history of developing sportspeople in the division, and began training Nadeem soon afterwards.

Before settling on javelin throw, Nadeem also pursued shot put and discus throw. Gold medals in the javelin throw in successive Punjab Youth Festivals and an inter-board meet propelled him on to the national stage, bringing offers from all the leading domestic departmental teams, including the athletics sections of the Pakistan Army, Air Force and Water and Power Development Authority (WAPDA).[18] It was his father, Muhammad Ashraf, who persuaded him to take up the sport of javelin throwing.[20] Nadeem actually aspired to become a full-time cricketer, but he changed his mind and shifted his focus to athletics as he first picked up the javelin in 2015; Nadeem himself acknowledged that it was "the best thing that happened" to him.

2022 Islamic Games: Gold medal
Five days later, on 12 August 2022, Nadeem won another gold medal for Pakistan at the 2021 Islamic Solidarity Games. He broke the games record with his throw of 88.55 m.

In November 2022, Nadeem won the gold medal in the javelin throw, with a toss of 81.21 m, at the 50th National Athletics Championship in Lahore.[48]

Elbow and knee injury (Late 2022)
Nadeem left for the UK on 1 December 2022 to get treatment on his injured elbow and knee joint. The AFP arranged for him to be treated at Spire Cambridge Lea Hospital. After a ten-day rehabilitation and physiotherapy period, full recovery took a further four to six weeks.

2023 Pakistan National Games and knee injury
In May 2023, Nadeem participated in the 34th National Games of Pakistan and won a gold medal with the longest throw of 78.02 m during his third attempt, while representing WAPDA. However, he suffered a knee injury, which ruled him out of the Asian Athletics Championships. 

2023 World Athletics Championships: Silver medal
Nadeem won a silver medal at the 2023 World Athletics Championships in Budapest with a throw of 87.82 m. He also secured qualification for the 2024 Summer Olympics during the event.

2024 Paris Diamond League
In July 2024, Nadeem finished in fourth place in the Paris Diamond League with a 84.21m throw on his fifth attempt.

2024 Paris Olympics: Gold medal and Olympic record
At the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris, Nadeem became the first Pakistani to win an Olympic medal in Athletics, by winning an Olympic gold medal. He is also the first Pakistani athlete to win an Olympic gold medal for an individual sport. He not only claimed the men's javelin throw title but set a new Olympic record of 92.97 m in the final.[58] The previous Olympic record holder was Norwegian Andreas Thorkildsen, who achieved 90.57 m at the 2008 Beijing Olympics.

Personal life
Arshad Nadeem is married and has a daughter and a son. He is a devout Muslim. Nadeem describes himself as an introvert. His coach, Salman Iqbal Butt, a former national-level discus thrower, remembered him as a very respectful and obedient athlete who bowed his head as he listened to his coach's words.

Who is Arshad Nadeem? 

Arshad Nadeem PP HI is a Pakistani javelin thrower. He is the reigning Olympic and Commonwealth Games champion and the current silver medalist in the World Athletics Championship. His 92.97 metres (305.0 ft) throw at the 2024 Summer Olympics is an Olympic and Asian record and also the sixth longest throw in the history of javelin throw, when considering only the best throw from each athlete.

He is a two-time Olympian, and the first Pakistani to qualify for the final of any track and field event at the Olympic Games[8] and the World Athletics Championships.

At the 2022 Commonwealth Games, he set a new national and Commonwealth Games record with a throw of 90.18 m (295.9 ft) and became the first athlete from South Asia to breach the 90 m mark.[10] In the 2023 World Athletics Championships, he became the first Pakistani athlete to win a medal at the World Athletics Championships, a silver. He represents the Water and Power Development Authority (WAPDA) in the National Games of Pakistan.

Early life

Arshad Nadeem was born into a Punjabi Muslim family in Mian Channu, in the Punjab province of Pakistan. The family belongs to the Jat community. He is the third-oldest among eight siblings. Nadeem was an exceptionally versatile athlete from his early school years. Though he dabbled in all the sports on offer in his school — cricket, badminton, football and athletics — his passion was cricket, and he soon found himself playing it at district-level tape-ball tournaments.Upon entering grade seven in school, Nadeem caught the eye of Rasheed Ahmad Saqi during an athletics competition. Saqi had a history of developing sportspeople in the division, and began training Nadeem soon afterwards.

Before settling on javelin throw, Nadeem also pursued shot put and discus throw. Gold medals in the javelin throw in successive Punjab Youth Festivals and an inter-board meet propelled him on to the national stage, bringing offers from all the leading domestic departmental teams, including the athletics sections of the Pakistan Army, Air Force and Water and Power Development Authority (WAPDA).[18] It was his father, Muhammad Ashraf, who persuaded him to take up the sport of javelin throwing.[20] Nadeem actually aspired to become a full-time cricketer, but he changed his mind and shifted his focus to athletics as he first picked up the javelin in 2015; Nadeem himself acknowledged that it was "the best thing that happened" to him.

2022 Islamic Games: Gold medal
Five days later, on 12 August 2022, Nadeem won another gold medal for Pakistan at the 2021 Islamic Solidarity Games. He broke the games record with his throw of 88.55 m.

In November 2022, Nadeem won the gold medal in the javelin throw, with a toss of 81.21 m, at the 50th National Athletics Championship in Lahore.[48]

Elbow and knee injury (Late 2022)
Nadeem left for the UK on 1 December 2022 to get treatment on his injured elbow and knee joint. The AFP arranged for him to be treated at Spire Cambridge Lea Hospital. After a ten-day rehabilitation and physiotherapy period, full recovery took a further four to six weeks.

2023 Pakistan National Games and knee injury
In May 2023, Nadeem participated in the 34th National Games of Pakistan and won a gold medal with the longest throw of 78.02 m during his third attempt, while representing WAPDA. However, he suffered a knee injury, which ruled him out of the Asian Athletics Championships. 

2023 World Athletics Championships: Silver medal
Nadeem won a silver medal at the 2023 World Athletics Championships in Budapest with a throw of 87.82 m. He also secured qualification for the 2024 Summer Olympics during the event.

2024 Paris Diamond League
In July 2024, Nadeem finished in fourth place in the Paris Diamond League with a 84.21m throw on his fifth attempt.

2024 Paris Olympics: Gold medal and Olympic record
At the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris, Nadeem became the first Pakistani to win an Olympic medal in Athletics, by winning an Olympic gold medal. He is also the first Pakistani athlete to win an Olympic gold medal for an individual sport. He not only claimed the men's javelin throw title but set a new Olympic record of 92.97 m in the final.[58] The previous Olympic record holder was Norwegian Andreas Thorkildsen, who achieved 90.57 m at the 2008 Beijing Olympics.

Personal life
Arshad Nadeem is married and has a daughter and a son. He is a devout Muslim. Nadeem describes himself as an introvert. His coach, Salman Iqbal Butt, a former national-level discus thrower, remembered him as a very respectful and obedient athlete who bowed his head as he listened to his coach's words.

At the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris, Nadeem became the first Pakistani to win an Olympic medal in Athletics, by winning an Olympic gold medal. He is also the first Pakistani athlete to win an Olympic gold medal for an individual sport. He not only claimed the men's javelin throw title but set a new Olympic record of 92.97 m in the final.[58] The previous Olympic record holder was Norwegian Andreas Thorkildsen, who achieved 90.57 m at the 2008 Beijing Olympics.

Personal life
Arshad Nadeem is married and has a daughter and a son. He is a devout Muslim. Nadeem describes himself as an introvert. His coach, Salman Iqbal Butt, a former national-level discus thrower, remembered him as a very respectful and obedient athlete who bowed his head as he listened to his coach's words.

localized.title: The Success Story of Arshad Nadeem, Who Brought Glory to Pakistan | Zor Ka Jor
localized.description:
#samaatv #sawerapasha #cricket #zorkajor #sawerapasha #Nadeemarshad  #mnadeem #arshadnadeem #arshadnadeemgoldmedal #arshadnadeemwins #arshadnadeemolympics 

The Success Story of Arshad Nadeem, Who Brought Glory to Pakistan | Zor Ka Jor

Who is Arshad Nadeem? 

Arshad Nadeem PP HI is a Pakistani javelin thrower. He is the reigning Olympic and Commonwealth Games champion and the current silver medalist in the World Athletics Championship. His 92.97 metres (305.0 ft) throw at the 2024 Summer Olympics is an Olympic and Asian record and also the sixth longest throw in the history of javelin throw, when considering only the best throw from each athlete.

He is a two-time Olympian, and the first Pakistani to qualify for the final of any track and field event at the Olympic Games[8] and the World Athletics Championships.

At the 2022 Commonwealth Games, he set a new national and Commonwealth Games record with a throw of 90.18 m (295.9 ft) and became the first athlete from South Asia to breach the 90 m mark.[10] In the 2023 World Athletics Championships, he became the first Pakistani athlete to win a medal at the World Athletics Championships, a silver. He represents the Water and Power Development Authority (WAPDA) in the National Games of Pakistan.

Early life

Arshad Nadeem was born into a Punjabi Muslim family in Mian Channu, in the Punjab province of Pakistan. The family belongs to the Jat community. He is the third-oldest among eight siblings. Nadeem was an exceptionally versatile athlete from his early school years. Though he dabbled in all the sports on offer in his school — cricket, badminton, football and athletics — his passion was cricket, and he soon found himself playing it at district-level tape-ball tournaments.Upon entering grade seven in school, Nadeem caught the eye of Rasheed Ahmad Saqi during an athletics competition. Saqi had a history of developing sportspeople in the division, and began training Nadeem soon afterwards.

Before settling on javelin throw, Nadeem also pursued shot put and discus throw. Gold medals in the javelin throw in successive Punjab Youth Festivals and an inter-board meet propelled him on to the national stage, bringing offers from all the leading domestic departmental teams, including the athletics sections of the Pakistan Army, Air Force and Water and Power Development Authority (WAPDA).[18] It was his father, Muhammad Ashraf, who persuaded him to take up the sport of javelin throwing.[20] Nadeem actually aspired to become a full-time cricketer, but he changed his mind and shifted his focus to athletics as he first picked up the javelin in 2015; Nadeem himself acknowledged that it was "the best thing that happened" to him.

2022 Islamic Games: Gold medal
Five days later, on 12 August 2022, Nadeem won another gold medal for Pakistan at the 2021 Islamic Solidarity Games. He broke the games record with his throw of 88.55 m.

In November 2022, Nadeem won the gold medal in the javelin throw, with a toss of 81.21 m, at the 50th National Athletics Championship in Lahore.[48]

Elbow and knee injury (Late 2022)
Nadeem left for the UK on 1 December 2022 to get treatment on his injured elbow and knee joint. The AFP arranged for him to be treated at Spire Cambridge Lea Hospital. After a ten-day rehabilitation and physiotherapy period, full recovery took a further four to six weeks.

2023 Pakistan National Games and knee injury
In May 2023, Nadeem participated in the 34th National Games of Pakistan and won a gold medal with the longest throw of 78.02 m during his third attempt, while representing WAPDA. However, he suffered a knee injury, which ruled him out of the Asian Athletics Championships. 

2023 World Athletics Championships: Silver medal
Nadeem won a silver medal at the 2023 World Athletics Championships in Budapest with a throw of 87.82 m. He also secured qualification for the 2024 Summer Olympics during the event.

2024 Paris Diamond League
In July 2024, Nadeem finished in fourth place in the Paris Diamond League with a 84.21m throw on his fifth attempt.

2024 Paris Olympics: Gold medal and Olympic record
At the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris, Nadeem became the first Pakistani to win an Olympic medal in Athletics, by winning an Olympic gold medal. He is also the first Pakistani athlete to win an Olympic gold medal for an individual sport. He not only claimed the men's javelin throw title but set a new Olympic record of 92.97 m in the final.[58] The previous Olympic record holder was Norwegian Andreas Thorkildsen, who achieved 90.57 m at the 2008 Beijing Olympics.

Personal life
Arshad Nadeem is married and has a daughter and a son. He is a devout Muslim. Nadeem describes himself as an introvert. His coach, Salman Iqbal Butt, a former national-level discus thrower, remembered him as a very respectful and obedient athlete who bowed his head as he listened to his coach's words.

Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne: Suhail Waraich Ki Asif Ali Santo Khan Se Farmaish | Eid Da Samaa

How Suhail Warraich Celebrates Eid? Senior Journalist Shares Insights | Eid Da Samaa | SAMAA

Santoo Khan Qawwal, a renowned name in the world of Qawwali, mesmerizes audiences with his soulful voice and traditional Sufi renditions. Carrying forward the rich legacy of Qawwali, his performances captivate music lovers worldwide. Experience the magic of his powerful vocals and spiritual melodies that touch the heart and soul. Stay tuned for his latest performances, interviews, and timeless classics!

Who is Santoo Khan?

Asif Ali Santoo Khan, born on February 8, 1973, in Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan, is a distinguished Qawwali singer renowned for his soulful performances and dedication to Sufi devotional music. His musical heritage spans over 350 years, tracing back to his great-grandfather, Mian Maula Baksh, a celebrated classical singer of the Indian subcontinent. His grandfather, Ustad Manzoor Hussain Santoo Khan, further enriched this legacy by settling in Lahore after the 1947 partition and becoming a prominent figure in Pakistan's music scene. ​

Asif Ali Santoo Khan began his musical training under the guidance of his father and grandfather, immersing himself in the rich traditions of Qawwali. His passion and talent led him to become a disciple of the legendary Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan, who regarded Asif as one of his finest students. This mentorship significantly influenced Asif's style, blending classical elements with his unique interpretations. ​
For those interested in experiencing his music, Asif Ali Santoo Khan maintains an active presence on social media platforms, including Instagram and YouTube, where he shares his latest performances and updates. ​
To get a glimpse of his captivating performances, you might enjoy this rendition of "Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne":

How Suhail Warraich Celebrates Eid? Senior Journalist Shares Insights | Eid Da Samaa | SAMAA

Santoo Khan Qawwal, a renowned name in the world of Qawwali, mesmerizes audiences with his soulful voice and traditional Sufi renditions. Carrying forward the rich legacy of Qawwali, his performances captivate music lovers worldwide. Experience the magic of his powerful vocals and spiritual melodies that touch the heart and soul. Stay tuned for his latest performances, interviews, and timeless classics!

Who is Santoo Khan?

Asif Ali Santoo Khan, born on February 8, 1973, in Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan, is a distinguished Qawwali singer renowned for his soulful performances and dedication to Sufi devotional music. His musical heritage spans over 350 years, tracing back to his great-grandfather, Mian Maula Baksh, a celebrated classical singer of the Indian subcontinent. His grandfather, Ustad Manzoor Hussain Santoo Khan, further enriched this legacy by settling in Lahore after the 1947 partition and becoming a prominent figure in Pakistan's music scene. ​

Asif Ali Santoo Khan began his musical training under the guidance of his father and grandfather, immersing himself in the rich traditions of Qawwali. His passion and talent led him to become a disciple of the legendary Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan, who regarded Asif as one of his finest students. This mentorship significantly influenced Asif's style, blending classical elements with his unique interpretations. ​
For those interested in experiencing his music, Asif Ali Santoo Khan maintains an active presence on social media platforms, including Instagram and YouTube, where he shares his latest performances and updates. ​
To get a glimpse of his captivating performances, you might enjoy this rendition of "Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne":

videos_data.description:
#gupshabwithvasaych #iftikharthakur #qaiserpiya #vasaychaudhry #gupshabwithvasaych #sabahameed #aliraza #actresssabahameed #actoraliraza #alirazaactor 

Show Mein Arbi Ki Entry | Non-Stop Jugtein | Hansi Ka Toufan

Pakistani Actor Ali Raza Kis Se Shadi Karen Ge? Qaiser Piya Ka Sawal

Pakistani Actor Ali Raza Kis Se Inspire Hote Hain?

Wase Coat aur Joot Kahan Se Liye? Vasay Chaudhry ke Sawal Par Qaiser Piya ka Jawab Sunein

Gup Shab With Vasay Chaudhry | Saba Hameed | Ali Raza | Iftikhar Thakur | Qaiser Piya | Full Program

Who is Saba Hameed? 

Saba Hameed  is a Pakistani actress and director.

She is one of the most popular actresses of Pakistan. She was one of the most successful actress of 1980s and 1990s. She got early recognition with her role of Sumbul in sitcom Family Front which broadcast for five years. Her recent recent roles are in the TV drama series Kahin Deep Jaley, Mere Humsafar and Fitoor.

Early life
Saba was born in Lahore, Pakistan, to writer and columnist Hameed Akhtar and Saadia, a film producer. She studied at the Lahore College for Women University. Her siblings include three sisters, with Huma and Lalarukh having also been actresses, and one brother.

Career
Saba Hameed started her four-decade-long career as an actress in 1978 on television and also worked in theatre from the mid-1980s to the mid-1990s. Saba has portrayed mother's role in many dramas & telefilms.

Personal life
Saba Hameed was previously married to Syed Pervaiz Shafi, with whom she had two children: a daughter, actress and singer Meesha Shafi, and a son, Faris Shafi.She is currently married to actor Waseem Abbas. Actor Ali Abbas is Waseem Abbas's son from his first marriage. Saba's two younger sisters, Huma Hameed and Lalarukh Hameed are both actresses. Lalarukh worked in dramas Mata-e-Gharoor, Andhera Ujala, Wafa, Dasht-E-Tanhai and Hazaron Raaste.

Whos is Ali Raza?

Muhammad Ali Raza (born 28 August 1998) is a Pakistani actor and model who works in Urdu television. Raza is known for portraying Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri (2023) and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar (2024-2025).

In January 2025, Dawn included him in the list of the 7 "Pakistani actors who stood out in 2024.

Early life and education
Ali Raza was born and brought up in Lahore, Pakistan.[6]

After doing a one-year diploma in graphic design, he studied at the Forman Christian College before joining the University of the Punjab, earning his degree in arts and design.

Career Model
Ali Raza started his career as a model in 2018.[6][7] As a model, he worked with some of the country's top fashion designers and commercial brands.

Actor
He made his acting debut in 2020 with Hum TV's drama Bhool Jaa Ay Dil. In 2023, he appeared in the Pakistani dramas Gunah, Meesni and Mohabbat Kay Baad. In 2024, he played Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri, Murad Shah in Noor Jahan, Nayab Adam in Duniyapur and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar.

Vasay Chaudhry (born on 12 November 1981) is a Pakistani screenwriter, actor, director, producer, host, and comedian. He is best known for writing sitcoms and comedy-dramas for Pakistani televisions. He is also known for writing films. He wrote Main Hoon Shahid Afridi and Jawani Phir Nahi Ani. While Mai Hoon Shahid Afridi was an average success, Jawani phir Nahe Ani went on to become the highest grossing film of Pakistan cinema and broke all the previous box office records while earning more than 490 million at the box office. He also wrote Jawani Phir Nahi Ani 2, which was released on 2018 Eid al-Adha and broke the all time biggest box office grosses record. It also went on to become the first Pakistani film to make 700 Million rupees worldwide.

videos_data.title: Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne Live Qawwali By Asif Ali Santoo | Eid Da Samaa | SAMAA TV
videos_data.description:
#samaatv #santooqawwali #eiddasamaa #sohailwarraich #eid #eidspecial 

Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne Live Qawwali By Asif Ali Santoo | Eid Da Samaa | Special Program | SAMAA TV

Santoo Khan Qawwal, a renowned name in the world of Qawwali, mesmerizes audiences with his soulful voice and traditional Sufi renditions. Carrying forward the rich legacy of Qawwali, his performances captivate music lovers worldwide. Experience the magic of his powerful vocals and spiritual melodies that touch the heart and soul. Stay tuned for his latest performances, interviews, and timeless classics!

Who is Santoo Khan?

Asif Ali Santoo Khan, born on February 8, 1973, in Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan, is a distinguished Qawwali singer renowned for his soulful performances and dedication to Sufi devotional music. His musical heritage spans over 350 years, tracing back to his great-grandfather, Mian Maula Baksh, a celebrated classical singer of the Indian subcontinent. His grandfather, Ustad Manzoor Hussain Santoo Khan, further enriched this legacy by settling in Lahore after the 1947 partition and becoming a prominent figure in Pakistan's music scene. ​

Asif Ali Santoo Khan began his musical training under the guidance of his father and grandfather, immersing himself in the rich traditions of Qawwali. His passion and talent led him to become a disciple of the legendary Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan, who regarded Asif as one of his finest students. This mentorship significantly influenced Asif's style, blending classical elements with his unique interpretations. ​
For those interested in experiencing his music, Asif Ali Santoo Khan maintains an active presence on social media platforms, including Instagram and YouTube, where he shares his latest performances and updates. ​
To get a glimpse of his captivating performances, you might enjoy this rendition of "Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne":

videos_data.title: Pakistani Actor Ali Raza Kis Se Shadi Karen Ge? Qaiser Piya Ka Sawal
videos_data.description:
#gupshabwithvasaych #iftikharthakur #qaiserpiya #vasaychaudhry #gupshabwithvasaych #sabahameed #aliraza #actresssabahameed #actoraliraza #alirazaactor 

Pakistani Actor Ali Raza Kis Se Shadi Karen Ge? Qaiser Piya Ka Sawal

Pakistani Actor Ali Raza Kis Se Inspire Hote Hain?

Wase Coat aur Joot Kahan Se Liye? Vasay Chaudhry ke Sawal Par Qaiser Piya ka Jawab Sunein

Gup Shab With Vasay Chaudhry | Saba Hameed | Ali Raza | Iftikhar Thakur | Qaiser Piya | Full Program

Who is Saba Hameed? 

Saba Hameed  is a Pakistani actress and director.

She is one of the most popular actresses of Pakistan. She was one of the most successful actress of 1980s and 1990s. She got early recognition with her role of Sumbul in sitcom Family Front which broadcast for five years. Her recent recent roles are in the TV drama series Kahin Deep Jaley, Mere Humsafar and Fitoor.

Early life
Saba was born in Lahore, Pakistan, to writer and columnist Hameed Akhtar and Saadia, a film producer. She studied at the Lahore College for Women University. Her siblings include three sisters, with Huma and Lalarukh having also been actresses, and one brother.

Career
Saba Hameed started her four-decade-long career as an actress in 1978 on television and also worked in theatre from the mid-1980s to the mid-1990s. Saba has portrayed mother's role in many dramas & telefilms.

Personal life
Saba Hameed was previously married to Syed Pervaiz Shafi, with whom she had two children: a daughter, actress and singer Meesha Shafi, and a son, Faris Shafi.She is currently married to actor Waseem Abbas. Actor Ali Abbas is Waseem Abbas's son from his first marriage. Saba's two younger sisters, Huma Hameed and Lalarukh Hameed are both actresses. Lalarukh worked in dramas Mata-e-Gharoor, Andhera Ujala, Wafa, Dasht-E-Tanhai and Hazaron Raaste.

Whos is Ali Raza?

Muhammad Ali Raza (born 28 August 1998) is a Pakistani actor and model who works in Urdu television. Raza is known for portraying Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri (2023) and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar (2024-2025).

In January 2025, Dawn included him in the list of the 7 "Pakistani actors who stood out in 2024.

Early life and education
Ali Raza was born and brought up in Lahore, Pakistan.[6]

After doing a one-year diploma in graphic design, he studied at the Forman Christian College before joining the University of the Punjab, earning his degree in arts and design.

Career Model
Ali Raza started his career as a model in 2018.[6][7] As a model, he worked with some of the country's top fashion designers and commercial brands.

Actor
He made his acting debut in 2020 with Hum TV's drama Bhool Jaa Ay Dil. In 2023, he appeared in the Pakistani dramas Gunah, Meesni and Mohabbat Kay Baad. In 2024, he played Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri, Murad Shah in Noor Jahan, Nayab Adam in Duniyapur and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar.

Vasay Chaudhry (born on 12 November 1981) is a Pakistani screenwriter, actor, director, producer, host, and comedian. He is best known for writing sitcoms and comedy-dramas for Pakistani televisions. He is also known for writing films. He wrote Main Hoon Shahid Afridi and Jawani Phir Nahi Ani. While Mai Hoon Shahid Afridi was an average success, Jawani phir Nahe Ani went on to become the highest grossing film of Pakistan cinema and broke all the previous box office records while earning more than 490 million at the box office. He also wrote Jawani Phir Nahi Ani 2, which was released on 2018 Eid al-Adha and broke the all time biggest box office grosses record. It also went on to become the first Pakistani film to make 700 Million rupees worldwide.

Who is Saba Hameed? 

Saba Hameed  is a Pakistani actress and director.

She is one of the most popular actresses of Pakistan. She was one of the most successful actress of 1980s and 1990s. She got early recognition with her role of Sumbul in sitcom Family Front which broadcast for five years. Her recent recent roles are in the TV drama series Kahin Deep Jaley, Mere Humsafar and Fitoor.

Early life
Saba was born in Lahore, Pakistan, to writer and columnist Hameed Akhtar and Saadia, a film producer. She studied at the Lahore College for Women University. Her siblings include three sisters, with Huma and Lalarukh having also been actresses, and one brother.

Career
Saba Hameed started her four-decade-long career as an actress in 1978 on television and also worked in theatre from the mid-1980s to the mid-1990s. Saba has portrayed mother's role in many dramas & telefilms.

Personal life
Saba Hameed was previously married to Syed Pervaiz Shafi, with whom she had two children: a daughter, actress and singer Meesha Shafi, and a son, Faris Shafi.She is currently married to actor Waseem Abbas. Actor Ali Abbas is Waseem Abbas's son from his first marriage. Saba's two younger sisters, Huma Hameed and Lalarukh Hameed are both actresses. Lalarukh worked in dramas Mata-e-Gharoor, Andhera Ujala, Wafa, Dasht-E-Tanhai and Hazaron Raaste.

Whos is Ali Raza?

Muhammad Ali Raza (born 28 August 1998) is a Pakistani actor and model who works in Urdu television. Raza is known for portraying Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri (2023) and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar (2024-2025).

In January 2025, Dawn included him in the list of the 7 "Pakistani actors who stood out in 2024.

Early life and education
Ali Raza was born and brought up in Lahore, Pakistan.[6]

After doing a one-year diploma in graphic design, he studied at the Forman Christian College before joining the University of the Punjab, earning his degree in arts and design.

Career Model
Ali Raza started his career as a model in 2018.[6][7] As a model, he worked with some of the country's top fashion designers and commercial brands.

Actor
He made his acting debut in 2020 with Hum TV's drama Bhool Jaa Ay Dil. In 2023, he appeared in the Pakistani dramas Gunah, Meesni and Mohabbat Kay Baad. In 2024, he played Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri, Murad Shah in Noor Jahan, Nayab Adam in Duniyapur and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar.

Vasay Chaudhry (born on 12 November 1981) is a Pakistani screenwriter, actor, director, producer, host, and comedian. He is best known for writing sitcoms and comedy-dramas for Pakistani televisions. He is also known for writing films. He wrote Main Hoon Shahid Afridi and Jawani Phir Nahi Ani. While Mai Hoon Shahid Afridi was an average success, Jawani phir Nahe Ani went on to become the highest grossing film of Pakistan cinema and broke all the previous box office records while earning more than 490 million at the box office. He also wrote Jawani Phir Nahi Ani 2, which was released on 2018 Eid al-Adha and broke the all time biggest box office grosses record. It also went on to become the first Pakistani film to make 700 Million rupees worldwide.

Santoo Khan Qawwal, a renowned name in the world of Qawwali, mesmerizes audiences with his soulful voice and traditional Sufi renditions. Carrying forward the rich legacy of Qawwali, his performances captivate music lovers worldwide. Experience the magic of his powerful vocals and spiritual melodies that touch the heart and soul. Stay tuned for his latest performances, interviews, and timeless classics!

Who is Santoo Khan?

Asif Ali Santoo Khan, born on February 8, 1973, in Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan, is a distinguished Qawwali singer renowned for his soulful performances and dedication to Sufi devotional music. His musical heritage spans over 350 years, tracing back to his great-grandfather, Mian Maula Baksh, a celebrated classical singer of the Indian subcontinent. His grandfather, Ustad Manzoor Hussain Santoo Khan, further enriched this legacy by settling in Lahore after the 1947 partition and becoming a prominent figure in Pakistan's music scene. ​

Asif Ali Santoo Khan began his musical training under the guidance of his father and grandfather, immersing himself in the rich traditions of Qawwali. His passion and talent led him to become a disciple of the legendary Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan, who regarded Asif as one of his finest students. This mentorship significantly influenced Asif's style, blending classical elements with his unique interpretations. ​
For those interested in experiencing his music, Asif Ali Santoo Khan maintains an active presence on social media platforms, including Instagram and YouTube, where he shares his latest performances and updates. ​
To get a glimpse of his captivating performances, you might enjoy this rendition of "Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne":

videos_data.title: Ali Raza Ki Farshi Shalwar Kaha Gai? | Gup Shab
videos_data.description:
#gupshabwithvasaych #iftikharthakur #qaiserpiya #vasaychaudhry #gupshabwithvasaych #sabahameed #aliraza #actresssabahameed #actoraliraza #alirazaactor 

Ali Raza Ki Farshi Shalwar Kaha Gai? | Gup Shab

Who is Saba Hameed? 

Saba Hameed  is a Pakistani actress and director.

She is one of the most popular actresses of Pakistan. She was one of the most successful actress of 1980s and 1990s. She got early recognition with her role of Sumbul in sitcom Family Front which broadcast for five years. Her recent recent roles are in the TV drama series Kahin Deep Jaley, Mere Humsafar and Fitoor.

Early life
Saba was born in Lahore, Pakistan, to writer and columnist Hameed Akhtar and Saadia, a film producer. She studied at the Lahore College for Women University. Her siblings include three sisters, with Huma and Lalarukh having also been actresses, and one brother.

Career
Saba Hameed started her four-decade-long career as an actress in 1978 on television and also worked in theatre from the mid-1980s to the mid-1990s. Saba has portrayed mother's role in many dramas & telefilms.

Personal life
Saba Hameed was previously married to Syed Pervaiz Shafi, with whom she had two children: a daughter, actress and singer Meesha Shafi, and a son, Faris Shafi.She is currently married to actor Waseem Abbas. Actor Ali Abbas is Waseem Abbas's son from his first marriage. Saba's two younger sisters, Huma Hameed and Lalarukh Hameed are both actresses. Lalarukh worked in dramas Mata-e-Gharoor, Andhera Ujala, Wafa, Dasht-E-Tanhai and Hazaron Raaste.

Whos is Ali Raza?

Muhammad Ali Raza (born 28 August 1998) is a Pakistani actor and model who works in Urdu television. Raza is known for portraying Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri (2023) and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar (2024-2025).

In January 2025, Dawn included him in the list of the 7 "Pakistani actors who stood out in 2024.

Early life and education
Ali Raza was born and brought up in Lahore, Pakistan.[6]

After doing a one-year diploma in graphic design, he studied at the Forman Christian College before joining the University of the Punjab, earning his degree in arts and design.

Career Model
Ali Raza started his career as a model in 2018.[6][7] As a model, he worked with some of the country's top fashion designers and commercial brands.

Actor
He made his acting debut in 2020 with Hum TV's drama Bhool Jaa Ay Dil. In 2023, he appeared in the Pakistani dramas Gunah, Meesni and Mohabbat Kay Baad. In 2024, he played Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri, Murad Shah in Noor Jahan, Nayab Adam in Duniyapur and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar.

Vasay Chaudhry (born on 12 November 1981) is a Pakistani screenwriter, actor, director, producer, host, and comedian. He is best known for writing sitcoms and comedy-dramas for Pakistani televisions. He is also known for writing films. He wrote Main Hoon Shahid Afridi and Jawani Phir Nahi Ani. While Mai Hoon Shahid Afridi was an average success, Jawani phir Nahe Ani went on to become the highest grossing film of Pakistan cinema and broke all the previous box office records while earning more than 490 million at the box office. He also wrote Jawani Phir Nahi Ani 2, which was released on 2018 Eid al-Adha and broke the all time biggest box office grosses record. It also went on to become the first Pakistani film to make 700 Million rupees worldwide.

Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne: Suhail Waraich Ki Asif Ali Santo Khan Se Farmaish | Eid Da Samaa

How Suhail Warraich Celebrates Eid? Senior Journalist Shares Insights | Eid Da Samaa | SAMAA

Santoo Khan Qawwal, a renowned name in the world of Qawwali, mesmerizes audiences with his soulful voice and traditional Sufi renditions. Carrying forward the rich legacy of Qawwali, his performances captivate music lovers worldwide. Experience the magic of his powerful vocals and spiritual melodies that touch the heart and soul. Stay tuned for his latest performances, interviews, and timeless classics!

Who is Santoo Khan?

Asif Ali Santoo Khan, born on February 8, 1973, in Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan, is a distinguished Qawwali singer renowned for his soulful performances and dedication to Sufi devotional music. His musical heritage spans over 350 years, tracing back to his great-grandfather, Mian Maula Baksh, a celebrated classical singer of the Indian subcontinent. His grandfather, Ustad Manzoor Hussain Santoo Khan, further enriched this legacy by settling in Lahore after the 1947 partition and becoming a prominent figure in Pakistan's music scene. ​

Asif Ali Santoo Khan began his musical training under the guidance of his father and grandfather, immersing himself in the rich traditions of Qawwali. His passion and talent led him to become a disciple of the legendary Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan, who regarded Asif as one of his finest students. This mentorship significantly influenced Asif's style, blending classical elements with his unique interpretations. ​
For those interested in experiencing his music, Asif Ali Santoo Khan maintains an active presence on social media platforms, including Instagram and YouTube, where he shares his latest performances and updates. ​
To get a glimpse of his captivating performances, you might enjoy this rendition of "Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne":

With years of experience in investigative journalism, he has interviewed some of the most influential political figures in Pakistan. His famous show ‘Aik Din Geo Ke Saath’ has been widely praised for its candid and engaging format. Stay updated with his latest analyses, interviews, and expert opinions on current affairs

In January 2025, Dawn included him in the list of the 7 "Pakistani actors who stood out in 2024.

Early life and education
Ali Raza was born and brought up in Lahore, Pakistan.[6]

After doing a one-year diploma in graphic design, he studied at the Forman Christian College before joining the University of the Punjab, earning his degree in arts and design.

Career Model
Ali Raza started his career as a model in 2018.[6][7] As a model, he worked with some of the country's top fashion designers and commercial brands.

Actor
He made his acting debut in 2020 with Hum TV's drama Bhool Jaa Ay Dil. In 2023, he appeared in the Pakistani dramas Gunah, Meesni and Mohabbat Kay Baad. In 2024, he played Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri, Murad Shah in Noor Jahan, Nayab Adam in Duniyapur and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar.

He is also known for writing films. He wrote Main Hoon Shahid Afridi and Jawani Phir Nahi Ani. While Mai Hoon Shahid Afridi was an average success, Jawani phir Nahe Ani went on to become the highest grossing film of Pakistan cinema and broke all the previous box office records while earning more than 490 million at the box office. He also wrote Jawani Phir Nahi Ani 2, which was released on 2018 Eid al-Adha and broke the all time biggest box office grosses record. Who is Saba Hameed? 

Saba Hameed  is a Pakistani actress and director.

She is one of the most popular actresses of Pakistan. She was one of the most successful actress of 1980s and 1990s. She got early recognition with her role of Sumbul in sitcom Family Front which broadcast for five years. Her recent recent roles are in the TV drama series Kahin Deep Jaley, Mere Humsafar and Fitoor.

Early life
Saba was born in Lahore, Pakistan, to writer and columnist Hameed Akhtar and Saadia, a film producer. She studied at the Lahore College for Women University. Her siblings include three sisters, with Huma and Lalarukh having also been actresses, and one brother.

Career
Saba Hameed started her four-decade-long career as an actress in 1978 on television and also worked in theatre from the mid-1980s to the mid-1990s. Saba has portrayed mother's role in many dramas & telefilms.

Personal life
Saba Hameed was previously married to Syed Pervaiz Shafi, with whom she had two children: a daughter, actress and singer Meesha Shafi, and a son, Faris Shafi.She is currently married to actor Waseem Abbas. Actor Ali Abbas is Waseem Abbas's son from his first marriage. Saba's two younger sisters, Huma Hameed and Lalarukh Hameed are both actresses. Lalarukh worked in dramas Mata-e-Gharoor, Andhera Ujala, Wafa, Dasht-E-Tanhai and Hazaron Raaste.

Whos is Ali Raza?

Muhammad Ali Raza (born 28 August 1998) is a Pakistani actor and model who works in Urdu television. Raza is known for portraying Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri (2023) and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar (2024-2025).

In January 2025, Dawn included him in the list of the 7 "Pakistani actors who stood out in 2024.

Early life and education
Ali Raza was born and brought up in Lahore, Pakistan.[6]

After doing a one-year diploma in graphic design, he studied at the Forman Christian College before joining the University of the Punjab, earning his degree in arts and design.

Career Model
Ali Raza started his career as a model in 2018.[6][7] As a model, he worked with some of the country's top fashion designers and commercial brands.

Actor
He made his acting debut in 2020 with Hum TV's drama Bhool Jaa Ay Dil. In 2023, he appeared in the Pakistani dramas Gunah, Meesni and Mohabbat Kay Baad. In 2024, he played Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri, Murad Shah in Noor Jahan, Nayab Adam in Duniyapur and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar.

videos_data.description:
#samaatv #santooqawwali #eiddasamaa #sohailwarraich #eid #eidspecial #toufeeqbutt  

Santo Khan Ka Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan Aur Rahat Fateh Ali Khan Se Mutaliq Sawal Par Zabardast Jawab

Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne: Suhail Waraich Ki Asif Ali Santo Khan Se Farmaish | Eid Da Samaa

How Suhail Warraich Celebrates Eid? Senior Journalist Shares Insights | Eid Da Samaa | SAMAA

Santoo Khan Qawwal, a renowned name in the world of Qawwali, mesmerizes audiences with his soulful voice and traditional Sufi renditions. Carrying forward the rich legacy of Qawwali, his performances captivate music lovers worldwide. Experience the magic of his powerful vocals and spiritual melodies that touch the heart and soul. Stay tuned for his latest performances, interviews, and timeless classics!

Who is Santoo Khan?

Asif Ali Santoo Khan, born on February 8, 1973, in Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan, is a distinguished Qawwali singer renowned for his soulful performances and dedication to Sufi devotional music. His musical heritage spans over 350 years, tracing back to his great-grandfather, Mian Maula Baksh, a celebrated classical singer of the Indian subcontinent. His grandfather, Ustad Manzoor Hussain Santoo Khan, further enriched this legacy by settling in Lahore after the 1947 partition and becoming a prominent figure in Pakistan's music scene. ​

Asif Ali Santoo Khan began his musical training under the guidance of his father and grandfather, immersing himself in the rich traditions of Qawwali. His passion and talent led him to become a disciple of the legendary Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan, who regarded Asif as one of his finest students. This mentorship significantly influenced Asif's style, blending classical elements with his unique interpretations. ​
For those interested in experiencing his music, Asif Ali Santoo Khan maintains an active presence on social media platforms, including Instagram and YouTube, where he shares his latest performances and updates. ​
To get a glimpse of his captivating performances, you might enjoy this rendition of "Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne":
.........................................................................
Sohail Khan Warraich 

Sohail Warraich is a renowned Pakistani journalist, analyst, and television host known for his in-depth political insights and distinctive interviewing style. With years of experience in investigative journalism, he has interviewed some of the most influential political figures in Pakistan. His famous show ‘Aik Din Geo Ke Saath’ has been widely praised for its candid and engaging format. Stay updated with his latest analyses, interviews, and expert opinions on current affairs

videos_data.title: Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne: Suhail Waraich Ki Asif Ali Santo Khan Se Farmaish | Eid Da Samaa
videos_data.description:
#samaatv #santooqawwali #eiddasamaa #sohailwarraich #eid #eidspecial #toufeeqbutt  

Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne: Suhail Waraich Ki Asif Ali Santo Khan Se Farmaish | Eid Da Samaa

How Suhail Warraich Celebrates Eid? Senior Journalist Shares Insights | Eid Da Samaa | SAMAA

Santoo Khan Qawwal, a renowned name in the world of Qawwali, mesmerizes audiences with his soulful voice and traditional Sufi renditions. Carrying forward the rich legacy of Qawwali, his performances captivate music lovers worldwide. Experience the magic of his powerful vocals and spiritual melodies that touch the heart and soul. Stay tuned for his latest performances, interviews, and timeless classics!

Who is Santoo Khan?

Asif Ali Santoo Khan, born on February 8, 1973, in Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan, is a distinguished Qawwali singer renowned for his soulful performances and dedication to Sufi devotional music. His musical heritage spans over 350 years, tracing back to his great-grandfather, Mian Maula Baksh, a celebrated classical singer of the Indian subcontinent. His grandfather, Ustad Manzoor Hussain Santoo Khan, further enriched this legacy by settling in Lahore after the 1947 partition and becoming a prominent figure in Pakistan's music scene. ​

Asif Ali Santoo Khan began his musical training under the guidance of his father and grandfather, immersing himself in the rich traditions of Qawwali. His passion and talent led him to become a disciple of the legendary Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan, who regarded Asif as one of his finest students. This mentorship significantly influenced Asif's style, blending classical elements with his unique interpretations. ​
For those interested in experiencing his music, Asif Ali Santoo Khan maintains an active presence on social media platforms, including Instagram and YouTube, where he shares his latest performances and updates. ​
To get a glimpse of his captivating performances, you might enjoy this rendition of "Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne":

Sohail Khan Warraich 

Sohail Warraich is a renowned Pakistani journalist, analyst, and television host known for his in-depth political insights and distinctive interviewing style. With years of experience in investigative journalism, he has interviewed some of the most influential political figures in Pakistan. His famous show ‘Aik Din Geo Ke Saath’ has been widely praised for its candid and engaging format. Stay updated with his latest analyses, interviews, and expert opinions on current affairs

videos_data.title: How Suhail Warraich Celebrates Eid? Senior Journalist Shares Insights | Eid Da Samaa | SAMAA
videos_data.description:
#samaatv #santooqawwali #eiddasamaa #sohailwarraich #eid #eidspecial #toufeeqbutt  

How Suhail Warraich Celebrates Eid? Senior Journalist Shares Insights | Eid Da Samaa | SAMAA

Santoo Khan Qawwal, a renowned name in the world of Qawwali, mesmerizes audiences with his soulful voice and traditional Sufi renditions. Carrying forward the rich legacy of Qawwali, his performances captivate music lovers worldwide. Experience the magic of his powerful vocals and spiritual melodies that touch the heart and soul. Stay tuned for his latest performances, interviews, and timeless classics!

Who is Santoo Khan?

Asif Ali Santoo Khan, born on February 8, 1973, in Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan, is a distinguished Qawwali singer renowned for his soulful performances and dedication to Sufi devotional music. His musical heritage spans over 350 years, tracing back to his great-grandfather, Mian Maula Baksh, a celebrated classical singer of the Indian subcontinent. His grandfather, Ustad Manzoor Hussain Santoo Khan, further enriched this legacy by settling in Lahore after the 1947 partition and becoming a prominent figure in Pakistan's music scene. ​

Asif Ali Santoo Khan began his musical training under the guidance of his father and grandfather, immersing himself in the rich traditions of Qawwali. His passion and talent led him to become a disciple of the legendary Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan, who regarded Asif as one of his finest students. This mentorship significantly influenced Asif's style, blending classical elements with his unique interpretations. ​
For those interested in experiencing his music, Asif Ali Santoo Khan maintains an active presence on social media platforms, including Instagram and YouTube, where he shares his latest performances and updates. ​
To get a glimpse of his captivating performances, you might enjoy this rendition of "Dil E Umeed Tora Hai Kisi Ne":
.........................................................................
Sohail Khan Warraich 

Sohail Warraich is a renowned Pakistani journalist, analyst, and television host known for his in-depth political insights and distinctive interviewing style. With years of experience in investigative journalism, he has interviewed some of the most influential political figures in Pakistan. His famous show ‘Aik Din Geo Ke Saath’ has been widely praised for its candid and engaging format. Stay updated with his latest analyses, interviews, and expert opinions on current affairs

videos_data.title: Saba Ke Sath Kaam Karte Hi Maloom Hogaya, Main Kamyab Adakar Banunga! | Gup Shab
videos_data.description:
#gupshabwithvasaych #iftikharthakur #qaiserpiya #vasaychaudhry #gupshabwithvasaych #sabahameed #aliraza #actresssabahameed #actoraliraza #alirazaactor 

Saba Ke Sath Kaam Karte Hi Maloom Hogaya, Main Kamyab Adakar Banunga! | Gup Shab 

Who is Saba Hameed? 

Saba Hameed  is a Pakistani actress and director.

She is one of the most popular actresses of Pakistan. She was one of the most successful actress of 1980s and 1990s. She got early recognition with her role of Sumbul in sitcom Family Front which broadcast for five years. Her recent recent roles are in the TV drama series Kahin Deep Jaley, Mere Humsafar and Fitoor.

Early life
Saba was born in Lahore, Pakistan, to writer and columnist Hameed Akhtar and Saadia, a film producer. She studied at the Lahore College for Women University. Her siblings include three sisters, with Huma and Lalarukh having also been actresses, and one brother.

Career
Saba Hameed started her four-decade-long career as an actress in 1978 on television and also worked in theatre from the mid-1980s to the mid-1990s. Saba has portrayed mother's role in many dramas & telefilms.

Personal life
Saba Hameed was previously married to Syed Pervaiz Shafi, with whom she had two children: a daughter, actress and singer Meesha Shafi, and a son, Faris Shafi.She is currently married to actor Waseem Abbas. Actor Ali Abbas is Waseem Abbas's son from his first marriage. Saba's two younger sisters, Huma Hameed and Lalarukh Hameed are both actresses. Lalarukh worked in dramas Mata-e-Gharoor, Andhera Ujala, Wafa, Dasht-E-Tanhai and Hazaron Raaste.

Whos is Ali Raza?

Muhammad Ali Raza (born 28 August 1998) is a Pakistani actor and model who works in Urdu television. Raza is known for portraying Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri (2023) and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar (2024-2025).

In January 2025, Dawn included him in the list of the 7 "Pakistani actors who stood out in 2024.

Early life and education
Ali Raza was born and brought up in Lahore, Pakistan.[6]

After doing a one-year diploma in graphic design, he studied at the Forman Christian College before joining the University of the Punjab, earning his degree in arts and design.

Career Model
Ali Raza started his career as a model in 2018.[6][7] As a model, he worked with some of the country's top fashion designers and commercial brands.

Actor
He made his acting debut in 2020 with Hum TV's drama Bhool Jaa Ay Dil. In 2023, he appeared in the Pakistani dramas Gunah, Meesni and Mohabbat Kay Baad. In 2024, he played Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri, Murad Shah in Noor Jahan, Nayab Adam in Duniyapur and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar.

Vasay Chaudhry (born on 12 November 1981) is a Pakistani screenwriter, actor, director, producer, host, and comedian. He is best known for writing sitcoms and comedy-dramas for Pakistani televisions. He is also known for writing films. He wrote Main Hoon Shahid Afridi and Jawani Phir Nahi Ani. While Mai Hoon Shahid Afridi was an average success, Jawani phir Nahe Ani went on to become the highest grossing film of Pakistan cinema and broke all the previous box office records while earning more than 490 million at the box office. He also wrote Jawani Phir Nahi Ani 2, which was released on 2018 Eid al-Adha and broke the all time biggest box office grosses record. It also went on to become the first Pakistani film to make 700 Million rupees worldwide.

localized.title: Ali Raza Ne Di Larki Ko Impress Karne Ki Tip | Gup Shab
localized.description:
#gupshabwithvasaych #iftikharthakur #qaiserpiya #vasaychaudhry #gupshabwithvasaych #sabahameed #aliraza #actresssabahameed #actoraliraza #alirazaactor 

Ali Raza Ne Di Larki Ko Impress Karne Ki Tip | Gup Shab 

Who is Saba Hameed? 

Saba Hameed  is a Pakistani actress and director.

She is one of the most popular actresses of Pakistan. She was one of the most successful actress of 1980s and 1990s. She got early recognition with her role of Sumbul in sitcom Family Front which broadcast for five years. Her recent recent roles are in the TV drama series Kahin Deep Jaley, Mere Humsafar and Fitoor.

Early life
Saba was born in Lahore, Pakistan, to writer and columnist Hameed Akhtar and Saadia, a film producer. She studied at the Lahore College for Women University. Her siblings include three sisters, with Huma and Lalarukh having also been actresses, and one brother.

Career
Saba Hameed started her four-decade-long career as an actress in 1978 on television and also worked in theatre from the mid-1980s to the mid-1990s. Saba has portrayed mother's role in many dramas & telefilms.

Personal life
Saba Hameed was previously married to Syed Pervaiz Shafi, with whom she had two children: a daughter, actress and singer Meesha Shafi, and a son, Faris Shafi.She is currently married to actor Waseem Abbas. Actor Ali Abbas is Waseem Abbas's son from his first marriage. Saba's two younger sisters, Huma Hameed and Lalarukh Hameed are both actresses. Lalarukh worked in dramas Mata-e-Gharoor, Andhera Ujala, Wafa, Dasht-E-Tanhai and Hazaron Raaste.

Whos is Ali Raza?

Muhammad Ali Raza (born 28 August 1998) is a Pakistani actor and model who works in Urdu television. Raza is known for portraying Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri (2023) and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar (2024-2025).

In January 2025, Dawn included him in the list of the 7 "Pakistani actors who stood out in 2024.

Early life and education
Ali Raza was born and brought up in Lahore, Pakistan.[6]

After doing a one-year diploma in graphic design, he studied at the Forman Christian College before joining the University of the Punjab, earning his degree in arts and design.

Career Model
Ali Raza started his career as a model in 2018.[6][7] As a model, he worked with some of the country's top fashion designers and commercial brands.

Actor
He made his acting debut in 2020 with Hum TV's drama Bhool Jaa Ay Dil. In 2023, he appeared in the Pakistani dramas Gunah, Meesni and Mohabbat Kay Baad. In 2024, he played Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri, Murad Shah in Noor Jahan, Nayab Adam in Duniyapur and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar.

Vasay Chaudhry (born on 12 November 1981) is a Pakistani screenwriter, actor, director, producer, host, and comedian. He is best known for writing sitcoms and comedy-dramas for Pakistani televisions. He is also known for writing films. He wrote Main Hoon Shahid Afridi and Jawani Phir Nahi Ani. While Mai Hoon Shahid Afridi was an average success, Jawani phir Nahe Ani went on to become the highest grossing film of Pakistan cinema and broke all the previous box office records while earning more than 490 million at the box office. He also wrote Jawani Phir Nahi Ani 2, which was released on 2018 Eid al-Adha and broke the all time biggest box office grosses record. It also went on to become the first Pakistani film to make 700 Million rupees worldwide.

videos_data.title: Ali Raza Ranveer Singh Ki Dressing Ke Devane | Gup Shab
videos_data.description:
#gupshabwithvasaych #iftikharthakur #qaiserpiya #vasaychaudhry #gupshabwithvasaych #sabahameed #aliraza #actresssabahameed #actoraliraza #alirazaactor 

Ali Raza Ranveer Singh Ki Dressing Ke Devane | Gup Shab 

Who is Saba Hameed? 

Saba Hameed  is a Pakistani actress and director.

She is one of the most popular actresses of Pakistan. She was one of the most successful actress of 1980s and 1990s. She got early recognition with her role of Sumbul in sitcom Family Front which broadcast for five years. Her recent recent roles are in the TV drama series Kahin Deep Jaley, Mere Humsafar and Fitoor.

Early life
Saba was born in Lahore, Pakistan, to writer and columnist Hameed Akhtar and Saadia, a film producer. She studied at the Lahore College for Women University. Her siblings include three sisters, with Huma and Lalarukh having also been actresses, and one brother.

Career
Saba Hameed started her four-decade-long career as an actress in 1978 on television and also worked in theatre from the mid-1980s to the mid-1990s. Saba has portrayed mother's role in many dramas & telefilms.

Personal life
Saba Hameed was previously married to Syed Pervaiz Shafi, with whom she had two children: a daughter, actress and singer Meesha Shafi, and a son, Faris Shafi.She is currently married to actor Waseem Abbas. Actor Ali Abbas is Waseem Abbas's son from his first marriage. Saba's two younger sisters, Huma Hameed and Lalarukh Hameed are both actresses. Lalarukh worked in dramas Mata-e-Gharoor, Andhera Ujala, Wafa, Dasht-E-Tanhai and Hazaron Raaste.

Whos is Ali Raza?

Muhammad Ali Raza (born 28 August 1998) is a Pakistani actor and model who works in Urdu television. Raza is known for portraying Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri (2023) and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar (2024-2025).

In January 2025, Dawn included him in the list of the 7 "Pakistani actors who stood out in 2024.

Early life and education
Ali Raza was born and brought up in Lahore, Pakistan.[6]

After doing a one-year diploma in graphic design, he studied at the Forman Christian College before joining the University of the Punjab, earning his degree in arts and design.

Career Model
Ali Raza started his career as a model in 2018.[6][7] As a model, he worked with some of the country's top fashion designers and commercial brands.

Actor
He made his acting debut in 2020 with Hum TV's drama Bhool Jaa Ay Dil. In 2023, he appeared in the Pakistani dramas Gunah, Meesni and Mohabbat Kay Baad. In 2024, he played Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri, Murad Shah in Noor Jahan, Nayab Adam in Duniyapur and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar.

Vasay Chaudhry (born on 12 November 1981) is a Pakistani screenwriter, actor, director, producer, host, and comedian. He is best known for writing sitcoms and comedy-dramas for Pakistani televisions. He is also known for writing films. He wrote Main Hoon Shahid Afridi and Jawani Phir Nahi Ani. While Mai Hoon Shahid Afridi was an average success, Jawani phir Nahe Ani went on to become the highest grossing film of Pakistan cinema and broke all the previous box office records while earning more than 490 million at the box office. He also wrote Jawani Phir Nahi Ani 2, which was released on 2018 Eid al-Adha and broke the all time biggest box office grosses record. It also went on to become the first Pakistani film to make 700 Million rupees worldwide.

Main Fahad Mustafa Se Inspire Hota Hoon | Gup Shab

Who is Saba Hameed? 

Saba Hameed  is a Pakistani actress and director.

She is one of the most popular actresses of Pakistan. She was one of the most successful actress of 1980s and 1990s. She got early recognition with her role of Sumbul in sitcom Family Front which broadcast for five years. Her recent recent roles are in the TV drama series Kahin Deep Jaley, Mere Humsafar and Fitoor.

Early life
Saba was born in Lahore, Pakistan, to writer and columnist Hameed Akhtar and Saadia, a film producer. She studied at the Lahore College for Women University. Her siblings include three sisters, with Huma and Lalarukh having also been actresses, and one brother.

Career
Saba Hameed started her four-decade-long career as an actress in 1978 on television and also worked in theatre from the mid-1980s to the mid-1990s. Saba has portrayed mother's role in many dramas & telefilms.

Personal life
Saba Hameed was previously married to Syed Pervaiz Shafi, with whom she had two children: a daughter, actress and singer Meesha Shafi, and a son, Faris Shafi.She is currently married to actor Waseem Abbas. Actor Ali Abbas is Waseem Abbas's son from his first marriage. Saba's two younger sisters, Huma Hameed and Lalarukh Hameed are both actresses. Lalarukh worked in dramas Mata-e-Gharoor, Andhera Ujala, Wafa, Dasht-E-Tanhai and Hazaron Raaste.

Whos is Ali Raza?

Muhammad Ali Raza (born 28 August 1998) is a Pakistani actor and model who works in Urdu television. Raza is known for portraying Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri (2023) and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar (2024-2025).

In January 2025, Dawn included him in the list of the 7 "Pakistani actors who stood out in 2024.

Early life and education
Ali Raza was born and brought up in Lahore, Pakistan.[6]

After doing a one-year diploma in graphic design, he studied at the Forman Christian College before joining the University of the Punjab, earning his degree in arts and design.

Career Model
Ali Raza started his career as a model in 2018.[6][7] As a model, he worked with some of the country's top fashion designers and commercial brands.

Actor
He made his acting debut in 2020 with Hum TV's drama Bhool Jaa Ay Dil. In 2023, he appeared in the Pakistani dramas Gunah, Meesni and Mohabbat Kay Baad. In 2024, he played Daniyal in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri, Murad Shah in Noor Jahan, Nayab Adam in Duniyapur and Shahnawaz Shah in Iqtidar.

Vasay Chaudhry (born on 12 November 1981) is a Pakistani screenwriter, actor, director, producer, host, and comedian. He is best known for writing sitcoms and comedy-dramas for Pakistani televisions. He is also known for writing films. He wrote Main Hoon Shahid Afridi and Jawani Phir Nahi Ani. While Mai Hoon Shahid Afridi was an average success, Jawani phir Nahe Ani went on to become the highest grossing film of Pakistan cinema and broke all the previous box office records while earning more than 490 million at the box office. He also wrote Jawani Phir Nahi Ani 2, which was released on 2018 Eid al-Adha and broke the all time biggest box office grosses record. It also went on to become the first Pakistani film to make 700 Million rupees worldwide.
